name: WakaTime
description: WakaTime integration and local time tracking

online.name: Enable WakaTime integration
online.description:
If enabled, your Geometry Dash Editor activity and level names will be sent to WakaTime servers for time tracking.

You can disable this option at any time to stop sending data

auto-download.name: Enable wakatime-cli auto-download
auto-download.description:
Automatically download and update the wakatime-cli binary required to send activity data to WakaTime.

If disabled, you must install wakatime-cli manually.
See the mod's README for manual installation instructions.

api-key.name: WakaTime API key
api-key.description:
Your WakaTime API key, available at https://wakatime.com/settings/account.

If left blank, the mod will attempt to use the key from your .wakatime.cfg file, if present.

api-url.name: WakaTime API URL
api-url.description:
The WakaTime server URL.

<cr>Warning: Changing this to a custom server will allow that server's owner to see your activity and project names.
Only change this if you know what you're doing.</c>

track-playtesting.name: Track Playtesting
track-playtesting.description: If enabled, playtesting will be tracked as Manual Testing. This setting only affects WakaTime integration, not the local tracking
